title: Hi, I’m Esteban. Nice to meet you.
subtitile: I have to tell you that in 2015 I began to study the career of Systems Analyst at the Autonomous University of Entre Ríos. Then, in the year 2020 month of December, I started this journey as a frontend web developer, I have not stopped learning at any time. So much so that I was able to get my first job as a frontend developer with react in June 2021. It is something that I am passionate about!
